descriptionHTML:
★★★ RUNNING ENGLISH FOR WEARABLE - ANDROID WEAR ★★★

When you are running or walking, you can study with this wearable application. This is very effective for your fitness and studying language, and easy to use. You can learning english word during your active activity.

1. ANDROID WEARABLE DEVICES SUPPORT - SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE & LG G-WATCH
2. REALTIME BURNED CALORIE CHECK SUPPORT
3. REALTIME ENGLISH WORD SUPPORT DURING YOUR ACTIVITY (ABOUT 2,000 WORD)
4. NAVTIVE SPEAKER PRONUNCIATION LISTENING MODE SUPPORT (SMAMRTPHONE ONLY)

- O2MOBILE SOFTWARE Inc -
recentChanges: v6.0 - Listening Mode Support In the SmartPhone
